bb-11.1: During your turn, control one enemey within %game.action.range% 5: %game.action.move% 2.

bb-13.1: During your single-target range attack, %game.elementHalf.consume:fire|air% to add +1 %game.action.range%, %game.action.pierce% 1.

bb-14.1: After an enemy's attack, %game.elementHalf.consume:earth|dark% to %game.condition.poison% that enemy.

bb-16.1: During your single-target ranged attack, add:

bb-18.1: During and enemy's attack, gain %game.action.shield% 1 and %game.action.retaliate% 1.

bb-19.1: After determining initiative, increase or decrease your initiative by 10.

bb-22.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one level 1 card from your hand or discard pile to its A-side.

bb-29.1: After an enemy's attack, %game.elementHalf.consume:fire|earth% to %game.condition.wound% that enemy.

bb-30.1: During your attack, treat your %game.bbAm.0% attack modifier as a %game.bbAm.1% attack modifier.

bb-33.1: After performing the top action of an ability card, also perform its bottom action.

bb-34.1: During your turn, %game.card.recover% one card from your hand or discard pile to its A-side.

bb-37.1: During an enemy's attack, %game.elementHalf.consume:air|dark% to gain %game.action.shield% 1 and %game.condition.muddle% that enemy.

bb-38.1: After your attack, %game.elementHalf.consume:air|light% to control the target of the attack: %game.action.move% 1.

bb-39.1: During your turn, gain %game.action.shield% 1 for the round. Create %game.element.wild%.

bb-4.1: During your turn, add %game.action.jump% to all your movement.

bb-5.1: Durin your turn, add +1 %game.action.attack% to all your attacks.

bb-6.1: During your turn, %game.elementHalf.consume:ice|air% to remove one negative condition.

bb-9.1: During your turn, add %game.action.pierce% 2 to all your melee attacks.

bb.15: Flip all of your abilitiy cards to their B-Site.
